Name: Limiting alternate side parking restrictions to ninety minute intervals.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting alternate side parking restrictions to ninety minute intervals.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


	Section 1.  Chapter two of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-175.4 to read as follows:
	§ 19-175.4  Time limit for alternate side parking restrictions.  a. Alternate side parking restrictions shall be limited to ninety minute intervals.       
	§2.	This local law shall take effect sixty days after its enactment into law.



JW
LS# 2163
4/26/11
